The intentional moment to moment awareness of our thoughts, feelings, sensations, and surrounding environment without judgement. 2. The use of a bodily anchor, such as your breath, to slow down and awaken to the life that is unfolding in the here and now. 3. The practice that nourishes classes, programs, and events hosted by Global Spiritual Life at NYU. Here you will find useful information about the University's construction projects, including project descriptions, announcements, and answers to frequently asked questions. For details click on pins in the interactive map or visit current projects »            Spotlight on Current Projects                      Construction on the Superblocks                     Academic Space Renovations 383 Lafayette                     Renovations at Hayden Hall 33 Wash Sq West                     NYU College of Nursing 433 First Avenue              Stay Connected            General Inquiries     During normal business hours, (Monday through Friday, 9:00 am - 5:00 pm), contact the NYU Office of Government and Community Affairs , the University's primary liaison to the community, at community.affairs@nyu.edu or 212.998.2400.   Outside of normal business hours, contact the NYU Office of Facilities & Construction Management at contactcsc@nyu.edu or 212.998.1001.              For questions regarding projects at the NYU Langone Medical Center and NYU School of Medicine , contact the Langone Medical Center's Real Estate Development Office .            Sign Up for Updates       Want to receive updates about NYU construction projects in your neighborhood? Fill out our online form to receive word if a construction project happens nearby. Join the list »                           Announcements              383 Lafayette Street     April 10, 2014  Interior work continues. The permanent lane closure is scheduled for the week of April 13th. Read more »              726 Broadway     April 10, 2015  Interior construction continues. The sidewalk fence instllation and Con Edision work commences the week of April 13th. Read more »            33 Washington Sq W, Hayden Hall   March 13, 2015  Contractors are scheduled to work on Saturday, March 14. Work hours are scheduled from 9:00 am - 5:00 pm. Read more »            Con Edison Vault on Greene Street     February 6, 2015  Con Edison is scheduled to begin work on their vault on Greene Street between Washington Place and West 4th Street on Monday, February 9, 2015. Weather permitting, the work is scheduled to occur over three weeks. The work will include repairs to the vault, the installation of reinforced steel, and a concrete pour.   Con Edison’s work hours will be Monday to Friday, 7:00 am to 3:00 pm.            4 Washington Place, Meyer   January 22, 2015  A packer truck will be staged on Mercer for debris removal Monday - Friday from 7:00 pm - 9:00 pm, starting on January 22 through January 31. Read more »            For previous updates, explore individual project pages.
